mapper.insert: insert into resource (keyId, className, classDesc, classURL, methodName, methodURL, requestType, batchNo, addTime, modifyTime, isDelete) values (#{keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into resource (keyId, className, classDesc, classURL, methodName, methodURL, requestType, batchNo, addTime, modifyTime, isDelete) values
( #{item.keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.classDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.classURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update resource set className = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classDesc = #{classDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classURL = #{classURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, methodName = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, methodURL = #{methodURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requestType = #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batchNo = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where keyId = #{keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select keyId, className, classDesc, classURL, methodName, methodURL, requestType, batchNo, addTime, modifyTime, isDelete from resource where keyId = #{keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select keyId, className, classDesc, classURL, methodName, methodURL, requestType, batchNo, addTime, modifyTime, isDelete from resource
select keyId, className, classDesc, classURL, methodName, methodURL, requestType, batchNo, addTime, modifyTime, isDelete from resource where isDelete = 0 and keyId in #{resourceId}
